extendedInfo.description: ClearMaster introduction: 1, The biggest feature of the software can uninstall system app , a lot of system program not only power consumption but also waste user flow, but the user can`t uninstall system program, clear master can help you uninstall.2, ClearMaster can also be quickly search and management apps in the sdcard 3, Mistaken delete system program can through the backup function recovery. 4, Long touch of the app item can view the app detailed information. 5, The software is very concise, about sixty KB, no networking, no background service.
